about.title: About Me
about.content: Passionate developer with 3 years of experience through a work-study program, mainly working with technologies like Java, C#, and React. I have a strong interest in software architecture and development best practices (Clean Code, hexagonal architecture), as well as DevOps tools such as Docker and Kubernetes. I enjoy collaborative environments where knowledge sharing is encouraged, and I actively contribute to improving code quality. Autonomous, detail-oriented, and always eager to learn, I'm driven by the desire to grow and work on technically challenging projects.
